games.title: Pitch Master
games.desc: Comprehensive pitch identification including octaves, intervals, bends, vibrato, glissando, portamento, envelopes, and harmonics

games.title: Relative & Absolute Pitch Trainer
games.desc: Train both relative and absolute pitch recognition with progressive difficulty

games.title: Melody Transformer
games.desc: Recognize and match melodies with transformations: transposition, inversion, retrograde, augmentation, diminution, ornamentation

games.title: Melody Pattern Detective
games.desc: Identify melody patterns including variations, combinations, echoes, sequences, modulations, and fragmentations

games.title: Melody Articulation Studio
games.desc: Distinguish and match melodies with different articulations and dynamics

games.title: Phrase Structure Analyzer
games.desc: Identify phrase boundaries, breathing points, symmetry, climax points, and cadences

games.title: Phrase Relationship Explorer
games.desc: Recognize phrase relationships: antecedent-consequent, parallel, contrast, repetition, variation

games.title: Phrase Transformation Lab
games.desc: Identify phrase transformations: elision, fragmentation, expansion, compression, sequencing

games.title: Scale & Mode Explorer
games.desc: Identify all major scales, minor scales (natural, harmonic, melodic), and church modes

games.title: Special Scales Detective
games.desc: Recognize pentatonic, blues, whole tone, and chromatic scales

games.title: Scale Degree Master
games.desc: Identify and name scale degrees in various contexts

games.title: Contour Transformer
games.desc: Match and identify contour transformations: inversion, retrograde, augmentation, diminution, fragmentation, sequencing

games.title: Contour Modifier
games.desc: Recognize modified contours: modulation, ornamentation, simplification, expansion, compression, transposition

games.title: Contour Analyzer Pro
games.desc: Comprehensive contour analysis and description including complex transformations

games.title: Rhythm Pattern Master
games.desc: Comprehensive rhythm pattern recognition including syllables, notation, clapping, tapping, and subdivisions

games.title: Rhythm Transformer
games.desc: Identify rhythm transformations: syncopation, polyrhythm, hemiola, augmentation, diminution, inversion, retrograde

games.title: Rhythm Pattern Detective
games.desc: Recognize rhythm patterns: fragmentation, sequences, variations

games.title: Tempo Change Detector
games.desc: Identify tempo changes: accelerando, ritardando, rubato, fermata, metric modulation

games.title: Pulse & Subdivision Master
games.desc: Identify pulse, subdivisions, doubling, halving, triplets, swing vs straight

games.title: Tempo Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze tempo stability and count tempo changes

games.title: Meter Master
games.desc: Identify all common meters: 2/4, 3/4, 4/4, 5/4, 6/8, 7/8, 9/8, 12/8

games.title: Meter Type Identifier
games.desc: Distinguish meter types: simple, compound, asymmetric

games.title: Meter Features Detector
games.desc: Identify meter features: modulation, accent patterns, downbeats

games.title: Rhythm Notation Master
games.desc: Match and identify all note and rest values with symbols

games.title: Tuplet & Grouping Expert
games.desc: Recognize triplets, tuplets, beam grouping, stem direction, flags

games.title: Notation Converter
games.desc: Convert between notation and rhythm, analyze complexity and clarity

games.title: Notation Speed Reader
games.desc: Read rhythm notation quickly and accurately

games.title: Polyrhythm Master
games.desc: Identify and perform polyrhythms: 2v3, 3v4, 4v5, and complex patterns

games.title: Polyrhythm Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze polyrhythm complexity and structure

games.title: Polyrhythm Transformer
games.desc: Transform, combine, and separate polyrhythmic patterns

games.title: Polyrhythm Creator
games.desc: Create and sequence original polyrhythmic patterns

games.title: Interval Master
games.desc: Identify all intervals: unison, m2, M2, m3, M3, P4, tritone, P5, m6, M6, m7, M7, octave

games.title: Interval Quality Detective
games.desc: Distinguish augmented and diminished intervals

games.title: Triad Master
games.desc: Identify all triads: major, minor, augmented, diminished

games.title: Seventh Chord Expert
games.desc: Identify seventh chords: dominant 7th, major 7th, minor 7th, half-diminished, fully-diminished

games.title: Extended Chord Identifier
games.desc: Recognize sus2, sus4, add9, 6th, 9th, and extended chords

games.title: Chord Progression Master
games.desc: Identify common progressions: I-IV-V-I, I-vi-IV-V, ii-V-I, I-IV-I-V

games.title: Harmonic Feature Detector
games.desc: Identify cadences, modulations, sequences, pedal points, ostinatos

games.title: Harmonic Rhythm Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze harmonic rhythm and progression patterns

games.title: Consonance & Dissonance Master
games.desc: Distinguish perfect consonance, imperfect consonance, and dissonance with tension/resolution

games.title: Non-Chord Tone Expert
games.desc: Identify suspensions, passing tones, neighbor tones, appoggiaturas, escape tones, anticipations

games.title: Instrument Family Master
games.desc: Identify all instrument families: strings, woodwinds, brass, percussion, keyboard, electronic, vocal

games.title: Instrument Type Explorer
games.desc: Distinguish hybrid, ancient, world, orchestral, chamber, solo, and ensemble instruments

games.title: String Instrument Identifier
games.desc: Identify violin, viola, cello, bass, guitar, harp

games.title: Wind Instrument Identifier
games.desc: Identify flute, oboe, clarinet, saxophone, trumpet, trombone, French horn, tuba

games.title: Keyboard & Percussion Identifier
games.desc: Identify piano and various percussion instruments

games.title: Timbre Quality Analyzer
games.desc: Distinguish bright/dark, warm/cold, harsh/smooth, thin/rich, nasal/resonant

games.title: Timbre Texture Detector
games.desc: Identify metallic/mellow, piercing/soft, vibrant/dull, articulate/blurred

games.title: Timbre Presence Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze overall timbre presence and characteristics

games.title: String Technique Detector
games.desc: Identify vibrato, tremolo, pizzicato, arco, glissando, portamento, harmonics

games.title: Articulation Technique Master
games.desc: Identify staccato, legato, mute techniques

games.title: Dynamic Level Master
games.desc: Identify all dynamic levels: ppp, pp, p, mp, mf, f, ff, fff

games.title: Relative Dynamics Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze relative dynamics and gradients

games.title: Dynamic Change Detector
games.desc: Identify crescendo, decrescendo, sudden changes, accents, sforzando, subito, swell, diminuendo, hairpins

games.title: Dynamic Pulse Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze dynamic pulsing and patterns

games.title: Articulation Master
games.desc: Identify legato, staccato, marcato, tenuto, portato, accents, breathing, phrasing

games.title: Expression Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze rubato and musical interpretation

games.title: Emotion Detector
games.desc: Identify emotional qualities: happy, sad, angry, peaceful, excited, mysterious, romantic, dramatic, playful, contemplative

games.title: Emotional Expression Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze complex emotional expression in music

games.title: Clef Master
games.desc: Read notes in treble, bass, alto, and tenor clefs

games.title: Grand Staff Reader
games.desc: Read notes on grand staff with ledger lines

games.title: Note Reading Master
games.desc: Read notes with accidentals, enharmonics, octave designations

games.title: Advanced Note Reader
games.desc: Read notes with rhythm, articulation, dynamics, expression, and complex combinations at speed

games.title: Scale Constructor
games.desc: Build major, minor, harmonic minor, melodic minor, pentatonic, blues, whole tone, chromatic, and modal scales

games.title: Exotic Scale Builder
games.desc: Build exotic and world music scales

games.title: Chord Constructor
games.desc: Build triads, 7th chords, 9th, 11th, 13th, suspended, added tone, altered, slash chords, polychords

games.title: Advanced Chord Builder
games.desc: Build complex and extended chord structures

games.title: Major Key Master
games.desc: Identify all major keys: C, G, D, A, E, B, F#, C#, F, Bb, Eb, Ab, Db, Gb, Cb

games.title: Minor Key Master
games.desc: Identify all minor keys and their relationships

games.title: Key Signature Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze key signatures and relationships

games.title: Key Change Detector
games.desc: Identify modulations and key changes

games.title: Melody Composer
games.desc: Compose melodies: start, continue, complete, transpose, invert, retrograde, augment, diminish, fragment, sequence

games.title: Rhythm Composer
games.desc: Compose rhythms with all transformations and create polyrhythms

games.title: Harmony Composer
games.desc: Compose harmonies: start, continue, complete, create progressions, voicings, counterpoint, modulations, cadences, ostinatos, pedal points

games.title: Orchestration Studio
games.desc: Orchestrate music: start, continue, complete, select instruments, create textures, layer sounds, assign dynamics, articulation, expression

games.title: Style Adapter
games.desc: Adapt compositions to different musical styles

games.title: Musical Form Master
games.desc: Identify binary, ternary, rondo, sonata, theme & variations, fugue, canon, passacaglia, chaconne, suite forms

games.title: Musical Style Identifier
games.desc: Identify Baroque, Classical, Romantic, Impressionist, Expressionist, Modernist, Jazz, Blues, Folk, Contemporary styles

games.title: Composer Identifier
games.desc: Identify works by major composers: Bach, Mozart, Beethoven, Chopin, Tchaikovsky, Debussy, Stravinsky, Gershwin, Ellington, and contemporary composers

games.title: Musical Element Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze texture, density, range, register, balance, contrast, unity, development, structure, coherence

games.title: Music Math Master
games.desc: Explore ratios, fractions, proportions, symmetry, patterns, sequences, Fibonacci, geometry, probability, statistics in music

games.title: Music Language Explorer
games.desc: Match phonemes, analyze prosody, identify accents, intonation, stress patterns, rhythm, syllables, alliteration, metaphors, narrative

games.title: Music Movement Studio
games.desc: Match gestures, dance patterns, locomotion, balance, coordination, symmetry, asymmetry, spatial relationships, temporal relationships, expressive movement

games.title: Advanced Harmony Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze chromatic, functional, non-functional, quartal, quintal, secundal, cluster, microtonal, spectral, atonal harmony

games.title: Advanced Rhythm Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze isorhythm, mensural rhythm, proportional notation, graphic notation, aleatoric, stochastic, fractal, generative, algorithmic, experimental rhythm

games.title: Advanced Form Analyzer
games.desc: Analyze sonata, rondo, fugal, cyclic, arch, sectional, developmental, minimalist, experimental, hybrid forms

games.title: Speed Challenge Master
games.desc: Identify pitches, intervals, chords, rhythms, tempos, instruments, notes, melodies, harmonies, forms quickly

games.title: Progressive Master Challenge
games.desc: Progressive difficulty training for pitch, intervals, chords, rhythms, tempos, instruments, notes, melodies, harmonies, forms

games.title: Competitive Battle Arena
games.desc: Compete in pitch, interval, chord, rhythm, tempo, instrument, note, melody, harmony, form battles
